preprocessing-info:
Steps:
  remove_punctuation
  remove_stopwords
  filter_words
  remove_docs
Parameters:
  stopwords extension:['from', 'subject', 're', 'edu', 'use']
  removed words with less than 0.005 or more than 0.98 documents with an occurrence of the word in corpus
  removed documents with less than 10 words

info.name: 20-newsgroups
info.description: The notorious collection of approximately 20,000 newsgroup posts, partitioned (nearly) evenly across 20 different newsgroups.
